WorkPlace.Name: Xterna A/S
WorkPlace.Description:
Xterna har profiler indenfor flere fagområder. Det er vigtigt for Xterna, at vores kunder får de medarbejdere, der har de bedste kvalifikationer til lige netop den opgave, der søges løst. 
Vi har bemanding inden for, og rekrutterer kvalificeret arbejdskraft til, bygge-, anlæg og industr

HiringOrg.Name: Xterna A/S
HiringOrg.Description:
Xterna har profiler indenfor flere fagområder. Det er vigtigt for Xterna, at vores kunder får de medarbejdere, der har de bedste kvalifikationer til lige netop den opgave, der søges løst. 
Vi har bemanding inden for, og rekrutterer kvalificeret arbejdskraft til, bygge-, anlæg og industr

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Xterna in Denmark is looking for skilled electricians for various projects across Denmark. Our projects are mainly new construction, both in industrial and domestic projects. Our ideal candidate should have minimum 3+ years’ experience as an electrician, MUST have conversational English skills and be willing to bring own car (at least one for every group of four).

If you are an experienced electrician with a diploma, we can offer you a job in Denmark with great conditions. The job starts as soon as possible and is full time. In case you know anyone who you would like to recommend for this opportunity, please have them apply for the job as well.

 

Job description: 

Panels - Building, mounting, connecting, testing, commissioning
CTS/Building automation - Pulling cables, knowledge of different components, troubleshooting, understanding CTS-blueprints
Industrial - Pulling cables, installing frequency drives, AC and DC motors, installing explotion protection, troubleshooting
COAX - Knowledge of CMC, amplifiers, passive elements, troubleshooting, reading technical drawings for cable television network
Network/Data systems - Pulling CAT cables, Mounting/connecting RJ 45 jacks and connectors, testing, commisioning, fiber optic splicing
Telecom - Upgrade, installation and implementation of new and available mobile sites while working in heights
